sn48.52:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā mallesu viharati uruvelakappaṃ nāma mallānaṃ nigamo.
sn48.52:1.4: “yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa ariyañāṇaṃ na uppannaṃ hoti neva tāva catunnaṃ indriyānaṃ saṇṭhiti hoti, neva tāva catunnaṃ indriyānaṃ avaṭṭhiti hoti.
sn48.52:1.5: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa ariyañāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, atha catunnaṃ indriyānaṃ saṇṭhiti hoti, atha catunnaṃ indriyānaṃ avaṭṭhiti hoti.
sn48.52:2.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāvakīvañca kūṭāgārassa kūṭaṃ na ussitaṃ hoti, neva tāva gopānasīnaṃ saṇṭhiti hoti, neva tāva gopānasīnaṃ avaṭṭhiti hoti.
sn48.52:2.2: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, kūṭāgārassa kūṭaṃ ussitaṃ hoti, atha gopānasīnaṃ saṇṭhiti hoti, atha gopānasīnaṃ avaṭṭhiti hoti.
sn48.52:2.3: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yāvakīvañca ariyasāvakassa ariyañāṇaṃ na uppannaṃ hoti, neva tāva catunnaṃ indriyānaṃ saṇṭhiti hoti, neva tāva catunnaṃ indriyānaṃ avaṭṭhiti hoti.
sn48.52:2.4: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa ariyañāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, atha catunnaṃ indriyānaṃ …pe… avaṭṭhiti hoti.
sn48.52:3.3: Paññavato, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tadanvayā saddhā saṇṭhāti, tadanvayaṃ vīriyaṃ saṇṭhāti, tadanvayā sati saṇṭhāti, tadanvayo samādhi saṇṭhātī”ti.
